::Perndabot/FZ::

Perndabot nods. "I'll contact him, one sec."

He taps his comm, silently sending a message to FZ.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the Iron Fist FZ sighs as his comm plays back Perndabot's message. 
Couldn't the bot handle a simple negotiation?

"I'm on my way. I'll be there soon," he replies, walking out of the 
bridge of the Iron Fist. He walks out of the ship, launching off 
toward Perndabot's position.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot looks back at Darkfate after recieving FZ's 
message. "Zardus is on his way. He'll be here soon," he says, almost 
quoting the transmission to Darkfate.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate::
> 
> "By now, I just can promise a no agression-deal" said 
Darkfate "Just 
> speaking with your leader I could said that it's an alliance -I 
like 
> speak with him. He can choose every place between his base and mine 
> for the meeting... Any trouble?"
